field.name: summary
field.value: Missing the #end off an if can cause the view to fail silently and partially render. Should throw exception.

field.name: description
field.value:
In case this is difficult to reproduce, the view I experienced this in is pasted below. See the inline comment ##This was the #end I was missing. #if($case.IsNew) You need to save before you can add services. #else #set ($alt = 0) #set ($serviceCount = 0) #foreach ($existingCaseProvider in $caseProviders) #foreach ($existingService in $existingCaseProvider.Services) #if ($existingService) #set ($alt = 1 - $alt) #set ($serviceCount = $serviceCount + 1) #end ##This was the #end I was missing. #end #end
$existingService.Description [Remove]
#if ($serviceCount = 0) There are no services. #end #end
